title: VLSI課程問題
content:
請問有人做過這個題目嗎？
能否幫我看一下code，教我如何寫
不好意思，剛學這個 🙏
謝謝您
https://i.imgur.com/3FHF4jS.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/pEAkMyY.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/2IIACvn.jpg

我打的如下
.lib 'c:\synopsys\cic018.l' TT

.global vdd gnd
vdd vdd gnd 1.8v
.subckt nand in out
mp11 Vdd B Vout Vdd pch l=0.18 w=1u
mp22 Vdd A Vout Vdd pch l=0.18 w=1u
mn11 Gnd B DD Gnd nch l=0.18 w=1u
mn22 DD A Vout Gnd nch l=0.18 w=1u

.subckt inv1 in out
mp1 Vdd VI Vout Vdd pch l=0.18u w=1u 
mn1 Gnd VI Vout Gnd nch l=0.18u w=2.1u 
.ends

.subckt inv2 in out
mp2 Vdd VI Vout Vdd pch l=0.18u w=3.8u M=8
mn2 Gnd VI Vout Gnd nch l=0.18u w=1u M=8
.ends

.subckt inv3 in out
mp3 Vdd VI Vout Vdd pch l=0.18u w=3.8u M=4
mn3 Gnd VI Vout Gnd nch l=0.18u w=1u M=4
.ends

.subckt inv4 in out
mp4 Vdd VI Vout Vdd pch l=0.18u w=3.8u M=3
mn4 Gnd VI Vout Gnd nch l=0.18u w=1u M=3
.ends

.subckt inv5 in out
mp5 Vdd VI Vout Vdd pch l=0.18u w=3.8u M=1
mn5 Gnd VI Vout Gnd nch l=0.18u w=1u M=1
.ends

x0 Vc V1 nand
c1 V1 Gnd 0.05p
x1 V1 V2 inv1
x2 V2 V3 inv2
x3 V3 V4 inv3
x4 V4 V5 inv4
x5 V5 V1 nand
x6 V5 V6 inv5
c2 V6 Gnd 0.01p
.ENDS
Vc Vc gnd pulse(0V 1.8V 1u 0n 0n 4u 4u)

.MEAS TRAN TR TRIG V(OUT) VAL=0.5 RISE=2 TARG V(OUT) VAL=4.5 RISE=2
.MEAS TRAN TF TRIG V(OUT) VAL=4.5 RISE=2 TARG V(OUT) VAL=0.5 RISE=2
.meas tran pmax avg power from=1us to=5us
.meas tran prid trig v(vo) val=1.6 Td=2u rise=1 targ v(vo) val=1.6 rise=2 
.meas tran f param='1/prid' 
.tran 1u 5u 
.alter
.PROT
.lib 'c:\synopsys\cic018.l' ff
.UNPROT
.alter
.PROT
.lib 'c:\synopsys\cic018.l' fs
.UNPROT
.alter
.PROT
.lib 'c:\synopsys\cic018.l' ss
.UNPROT
.alter
.PROT
.lib 'c:\synopsys\cic018.l' sf
.UNPROT
.end
excerpt: 請問有人做過這個題目嗎？能否幫我看一下code，教我如何寫，不好意思，剛學這個，謝謝您，我打的如下，.lib 'c：\synopsys\cic018.l' TT，.global vdd gnd，vdd
